con:request.name: SubmitPPIPayment-VantivCPS
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="https://www.velocitypayment.com/ws" xmlns:ppi="http://www.ePayments.com/PPI" xmlns:ppip="http://www.ePayments.com/PPIPayment"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:SubmitPPIPayment> <!--Optional:--> <ws:token> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:UserName>user3576</ppi:UserName> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Password>pwd3576</ppi:Password> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:PPITransactionRequestId>sdfsdf345r56456rgfsd</ppi:PPITransactionRequestId> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken>3576</ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken> </ws:token> <!--Optional:--> <ws:payment Notes=""> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:AdditionalInfo> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ppi:Fees> <ppip:FeeType>Customer</ppip:FeeType> <ppip:Amount>0</ppip:Amount> </ppi:Fees> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ppi:InvoiceData> <ppip:Amount/> <!--Optional:--> </ppi:InvoiceData> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ppi:PaymentSegment> <ppip:Amount>1.00</ppip:Amount> <!--Optional:--> <ppip:SegmentType>Regular</ppip:SegmentType> </ppi:PaymentSegment> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:PaymentType>Regular</ppi:PaymentType> <ppi:ProcessDate>${TodaysDate#Date Today}</ppi:ProcessDate>
<!--Zero or more repetitions:--> </ppi:AdditionalInfo> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Customer> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Zip>21054</ppi:Zip> </ppi:Customer> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:ClientAccountNumber>3576a101</ppi:ClientAccountNumber> <ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly>false</ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly> <ppi:PaymentSource>Agent</ppi:PaymentSource> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Payor> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:AddressLine1>2311 York Road</ppi:AddressLine1> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:FirstName>Imtiaz</ppi:FirstName> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:LastName>Ahmed</ppi:LastName> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:ZipCode>22201</ppi:ZipCode> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:IsBusinessName/> </ppi:Payor> <!--Optional:--> <ppi:Vehicle> <!--Optional:--> <ppip:AccountType/> <!--Optional:--> <ppip:CheckType/> <ppip:CheckNumberPosition/> <!--Optional:--> <ppip:CVV2Code>217</ppip:CVV2Code> <!--Optional:--> <ppip:ExpirationDate>12/31</ppip:ExpirationDate> <!--Optional:--> <ppip:PaymentVehicleNumber>4358808486916303</ppip:PaymentVehicleNumber> <ppip:PaymentMethodCategory>CreditCard</ppip:PaymentMethodCategory> <ppip:EnforcePinDebitValidation/> </ppi:Vehicle> </ws:payment> <ws:storedCredential/> </ws:SubmitPPIPayment> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Void-VantivCPS
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="https://www.velocitypayment.com/ws"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:VoidPPIPayment> <ws:token> <ppi:UserName xmlns:ppi="http://www.ePayments.com/PPI">user3576</ppi:UserName> <ppi:Password xmlns:ppi="http://www.ePayments.com/PPI">pwd3576</ppi:Password> <ppi:PPITransactionRequestId xmlns:ppi="http://www.ePayments.com/PPI">sdfsdf456ygdfgdf</ppi:PPITransactionRequestId> <ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken xmlns:ppi="http://www.ePayments.com/PPI">3576</ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken> </ws:token> <ws:paymentId>${SubmitPPIPayment-VantivCPS#Response#declare namespace ns0='http://www.ePayments.com/PPI'; declare namespace ns1='https://www.velocitypayment.com/ws'; //ns1:SubmitPPIPaymentResponse[1]/ns1:SubmitPPIPaymentResult[1]/ns0:PaymentID[1]}</ws:paymentId> <ws:code>A1</ws:code> <ws:comments>Voiding this payment</ws:comments> </ws:VoidPPIPayment> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.script: def sdf = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd") return sdf.format(new Date()) + "T08:59:00.000-04:00"
